forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning with mainly sunny skies during the afternoon hours as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning with mainly sunny skies during the afternoon hours as drier air moves in on gusty breezes. High 49F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies with gusty winds developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
